thread.title: Samsung Galaxy S8’s alleged press renders leaked again, show off bezel-less design
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy S8’s alleged press renders leaked again, show off bezel-less design

title: Samsung Galaxy S8’s alleged press renders leaked again, show off bezel-less design
text:
Samsung Galaxy S8’s alleged press renders leaked again, show off bezel-less design Samsung Galaxy S8’s alleged press renders leaked again, show off bezel-less design By   Samsung Galaxy S8 will be unveiled on March 29th, and the launch event will be live streamed” 
Earlier this week, the popular tipster @evleaks posted some alleged renders of the Samsung Galaxy S8 and Galaxy S8+ flagships, revealing the design of their front, along with the various colour options. Today, the tipster is back with yet another Samsung Galaxy S8 leak. The leakster has posted more renders of the Galaxy S8, and this time the focus is on the rear. — Evan Blass (@evleaks) March 20, 2017 
As seen in the renders, the Samsung Galaxy S8 will feature an almost bezel-less display. The device will feature a dual-edged curved display, and its top and bottom bezels will be quite slim too. The phone’s fingerprint sensor will be located on the back panel, next to the rear camera. Unfortunately, the tipster didn’t reveal any other details of the Galaxy S8. 
March 29th is the confirmed launch date for the Galaxy S8. The event will kick off at 8.30 am on Wednesday, and will be live streamed on the company’s website for the world to watch. Facebook Comments
